All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthController
REST controller for handling authentication-related requests.
AuthRequest
Represents the authentication request, containing the JWT token.
AuthResponse
Represents the authentication response, containing the JWT token and user roles.
Condition
Represents the possible medical condition categories or triage levels for a patient.
ErrorResponse
Represents a standardized error response sent to the client.
Event
Represents an event, such as a simulation exercise or real-world incident.
EventController
REST controller for managing Event resources.
EventForm
Form object used for receiving event data from clients, typically for creating or updating an event.
EventRepo
Repository interface for managing Event entities.
EventService
Service interface defining the contract for managing Event entities.
EventServiceImp
Implementation of the EventService interface.
EventTimerService
Service interface defining the contract for managing event timing and broadcasting updates.
EventTimerServiceImp
Implementation of the EventTimerService interface.
EventTmpForm
Form object used for receiving data to create a new Event.
EventWebSocketConfiguration
Configuration class for setting up WebSocket message handling using STOMP.
EventWebSocketController
WebSocket controller for handling real-time updates related to Event objects.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Centralized exception handler for the entire application.
JwtAuthenticationFilter
JwtAuthenticationFilter A custom Spring Security filter that intercepts incoming requests to: Extract a JWT from the Authorization header (Bearer token) or a "token" cookie. Validate the extracted JWT. If the JWT is valid, authenticate the user by setting the authenticated user in the Spring Security SecurityContext. Allow the request to proceed down the filter chain if authentication is successful or if no token is found. Send an unauthorized error response if the token is invalid or expired. This filter ensures that requests requiring authentication have a valid JWT.
JwtUtil
JwtUtil Utility class for generating, validating, and parsing JSON Web Tokens (JWT).
PageController
PageController.java Controller for handling requests to the home page after successful SAML authentication.
Patient
Represents a patient within an event.
PatientForm
Form object used for receiving patient data from clients, typically for creating or updating a patient.
PatientPool
Represents a patient pool within an event.
PatientPoolRepo
Repository interface for managing PatientPool entities.
PatientPoolTmp
Represents a template for creating patient pools.
PatientPoolTmpController
REST controller for managing PatientPoolTmp resources.
PatientPoolTmpForm
Form object used for receiving data to create a new PatientPoolTmp.
PatientPoolTmpRepo
Repository interface for managing PatientPoolTmp entities.
PatientPoolTmpService
Service interface defining the contract for managing PatientPoolTmp entities.
PatientPoolTmpServiceImp
Implementation of the PatientPoolTmpService interface.
PatientRepo
Repository interface for managing Patient entities.
PoolType
Represents the different types of patient pools or areas within an event.
ResponseWrapper<T>
A generic wrapper class for standardizing API or WebSocket responses.
RetriageApplication
The main entry point for the Retriage Spring Boot application.
Role
Represents the different roles or levels of access a user can have within the application.
SamlAuthenticationSuccessHandler
Handles successful SAML2 authentication by generating a JWT for the authenticated user.
SecurityConfiguration
Configures Spring Security for SAML 2.0 Service Provider functionality.
Status
Represents the possible statuses of an event within the system.
SuccessResponse
Represents a standard structure for returning a successful response from an API endpoint.
User
Represents a user within the application.
UserController
REST controller for managing user-related API requests.
UserDto
A Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a simplified view of a User.
UserRepo
Repository interface for managing User entities.
UserService
Service interface defining the contract for managing User entities.
UserServiceImp
Implementation of the UserService interface.
